mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAFE( CAFENUMBER, NAME, OPTIONNAME, PRICE, LOCATION, BUSINESSNUMBER, TIMAGE, IMAGE )VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(cafeNUMBER),0)+1 FROM CAFE), #{name}, #{optionName}, #{price}, #{location}, #{businessNumber}, #{tImage}, #{image} )
mapper.select: SELECT CAFENUMBER, NAME, OPTIONNAME, PRICE, LOCATION, TIMAGE, IMAGE FROM CAFE CAFENUMBER = #{cafeNumber}
SELECT B.* FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM( SELECT CAFENUMBER, NAME, OPTIONNAME, PRICE, LOCATION, TIMAGE, IMAGE FROM CAFE ORDER BY CAFENUMBER ) A) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
